scenes.description: Title card for the 3D Showcase featuring Ouro Kronii, displaying event times for PDT, CEST, and JST.
Ouro Kronii performs a 3D song performance of 'Idol' on a grand stage.

subtitles.original:
3D Showcase
September 17 20:00 PDT
September 18 05:00 CEST 12:00 JST
subtitles.english:
3D Showcase
September 17 20:00 PDT
September 18 05:00 CEST 12:00 JST

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: With an invincible smile, she messes with the media

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: I want to know her secret, she's so mysterious

subtitles.original: 抜けてるところさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even her clumsy moments are within her charm's reach

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: You, perfect and full of lies, are a genius idol

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？好きな本は？
subtitles.english: What did you eat today? What's your favorite book?

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: If you go out for fun, where do you go?

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない、それは内緒
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten anything, that's a secret

subtitles.original: 何を聞かれてものらりくらり
subtitles.english: Dodging any questions asked

subtitles.original: そう淡々とだけど燦々と
subtitles.english: So nonchalantly, yet so brilliantly

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない秘密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: Secrets almost visible but not, taste like honey

subtitles.original: あれもないないない
subtitles.english: That's not there, not there

subtitles.original: これもないないない
subtitles.english: This isn't there, not there

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？相手は？さあ答えて
subtitles.english: What's your type? Who's the person? Come on, answer

subtitles.original: 「誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ」
subtitles.english: "I don't really know what it's like to fall in love with someone"

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない
subtitles.english: Impossible to know if it's a lie or the truth

subtitles.original: そんな言葉にまた一人落ちる
subtitles.english: One more person falls for those words

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Enthralling them once again

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone's eyes are being stolen

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: You're the perfect and ultimate idol

subtitles.original: 金輪際現れない一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: A star that'll never appear again, a reincarnation of the first star

subtitles.original: その笑顔で愛してるで誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: Captivating everyone with that smile and those "I love you"s

subtitles.original: その瞳がその言葉が
subtitles.english: Those eyes, those words

subtitles.original: 嘘でもそれは完全なアイ
subtitles.english: Even if they're lies, it's a perfect love

subtitles.original: はいはいあの子は特別です
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, that girl is special

subtitles.original: 我々は端からおまけです
subtitles.english: We are just extras from the start

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: Just character B making the star look good

subtitles.original: 全てがあの子のおかげなわけない
subtitles.english: There's no way everything is thanks to her

subtitles.original: 洒落臭い妬み嫉みなんてないわけがない
subtitles.english: There's no way there's no petty envy and jealousy

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃないからこそ許せない
subtitles.english: Since it's not a joke, it's unforgivable

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない君じゃ許せない
subtitles.english: I won't forgive you if you're not perfect

subtitles.original: 自分を許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive myself

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強い君以外は認めない
subtitles.english: I won't accept anyone but the strongest you

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じ崇めてる
subtitles.english: Everyone believes in and worships you

subtitles.original: まさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: Truly the strongest, invincible idol

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない一番星を宿している
subtitles.english: Showing no weaknesses, you house the brightest star

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: Don't ever show any weak spots

subtitles.original: 知りたくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Hiding the parts we don't want to know

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: You have to be one and only, or else

subtitles.original: それこそ本物のアイ
subtitles.english: That is what true love is

subtitles.original: 特意の笑顔で沸かすメディア
subtitles.english: Working the media with a signature smile

subtitles.original: 隠しきるこの秘密だけは
subtitles.english: Keeping this one secret hidden

subtitles.original: 愛してるって嘘で積むキャリア
subtitles.english: Building a career on the lie of "I love you"

subtitles.original: これこそ私なりの愛
subtitles.english: This is my version of love
